text: Suppose an operating system is trying to minimize average turnaround time of the processes it is running. Then, which of the following are approaches its scheduler could take to help achieve this goal? (@) prefer to run processes that would start their next 1/O operations sooner (b) prefer to run more CPU-intensive processes before other processes (o) prefer to run more processes that have been runnable less often than other processes (d)When an 1/O operation finishes, wait to schedule the newly runnable process until the currently running process is ready to yield the CPU.
